title: Diablo2 LoD + Dream of Harrogath mod + Maphack + D2loader ++
description:
Welcome to Dream of Harrogath!!!
      Dreamgaming.co.uk

Whats in this Package?
Pre installed:
-Diablo 2 Lord of Destruction 1.13c
-Diablo 2 Dream of Harrogath mod (vanilla mod is in the "Vanilla Patch" folder for easy swap. its just that Patch_D2.MPQ if for any reason you wish to play it.)
-Dream of Harrogath Game Launcher
-D2 Loader for 1.13c (to open multiple windows in case you want to mule some items)
-Sting's Hackmap for 1.13c (maphack) with preconfigured config files
-Autoteleport 1.4 for 1.13c
-BNGatewayEditor (not needed since the Launcher will connect you automatically to Dream of Harrogath)
-1.13c DLL files (None of them are modified)


How to Connect to our server?
1. Open Dream of Harrogath Launcher
2. Click "Play"


What are the Changes made on this mod?
General Changes 
http://dreamgaming.co.uk/forum/viewtopic.php?f=21&t=637

1.0 
http://dreamgaming.co.uk/forum/viewtopic.php?f=21&t=47730

Visit Dreamgaming.co.uk for more info


Something not working right?
1. Run the following in administrator mode: D2Loader/Stings maphack/Game Launcher
-Right-click the Battle.net Desktop Application icon and select Properties.
-Select the Compatibility tab.
-Click Change settings for all users.
-Under Privilege Level, check Run this program as administrator.
-Click Apply.

2. Turn Off (DEP) Data execution Prevention
- http://www.thewindowsclub.com/turn-off-data-execution-prevention-dep
- http://www.online-tech-tips.com/windows-xp/disable-turn-off-dep-windows/


3. Run Diablo II in compatibility mode.
-Right-click the Diablo II icon and click Properties.
-Click the Compatibility tab.
-Check Run this program in compatibility mode.
-Select Windows XP (Service Pack 2) from the dropdown.
-Windows Vista / Windows 7 only: make sure Disable desktop composition and Run this program as an administrator are checked.
-Click OK.

Then try the Dream of Harrogath Launcher again
